languages.text: "Не имею ни малейшего представления. И, думается мне, никто из присутствующих тоже не знает, иначе за Фиделио уже охотилось бы два десятка наемных убийц, где бы он или она ни скрывались. Речь о большом наследстве, в конце концов. И другие претенденты не очень довольны, что не попали в завещание".

"I haven't the faintest idea. And I think that no one present knows either, or two dozen hired killers would have already begun a manhunt for this Fidelio, wherever they may be hiding. This is, after all, a significant inheritance. And the other claimants are not exactly pleased at being left out of the will."
languages.original_text: "Не имею ни малейшего представления. И, думается мне, никто из присутствующих тоже не знает, иначе за Фиделио уже охотилось бы два десятка наемных убийц, где бы он или она ни скрывались. Речь о большом наследстве, в конце концов. И другие претенденты не очень довольны, что не попали в завещание".

traits.locale_text: "I haven't the faintest idea. And I think that none of those present know either, or two dozen hired killers would have already begun a manhunt for this Fidelio, wherever they may be hiding. This is, after all, a significant inheritance. And the other claimants are not exactly pleased with having been left out of the will."

"I haven't the faintest idea. And I think that none of those present know either, or two dozen hired killers would have already begun a manhunt for this Fidelio, wherever they may be hiding. This is, after all, a significant inheritance. And the other claimants are not exactly pleased with having been left out of the will."

This is, after all, a significant inheritance. And the other claimants are not exactly pleased at being left out of the will."

"I haven't the faintest idea. And I think that no one present knows either, or two dozen hired killers would have already begun a manhunt for this Fidelio, wherever they may be hiding. This is, after all, a significant inheritance. And the other claimants are not exactly pleased at being left out of the will."

"I haven't the faintest idea. And I think that no one present knows either, or two dozen hired killers would have already begun a manhunt for this Fidelio, wherever they may be hiding. This is, after all, a significant inheritance. And the other claimants are not exactly pleased at being left out of the will."

languages.text: “我完全是一头雾水。恐怕在场的人也都不清楚，否则无论这个菲迪奥藏在什么地方，身后都会跟着几十个雇佣杀手。毕竟，这是一笔庞大的遗产。其余的人被排除在遗嘱之外，他们恐怕不会很满意这样的安排。”
languages.original_text: "I haven't the faintest idea. And I think that no one present knows either, or two dozen hired killers would have already begun a manhunt for this Fidelio, wherever they may be hiding. This is, after all, a significant inheritance. And the other claimants are not exactly pleased at being left out of the will."

traits.locale_text: “我完全是一头雾水。恐怕在场的人也都不清楚，否则无论这个菲迪奥藏在什么地方，身后都会跟着几十个雇佣杀手。毕竟，这是一笔庞大的遗产。其余的人被排除在遗嘱之外，他们恐怕不会很满意这样的安排。”

languages.text: «No tengo ni la menor idea. Y creo que ninguno de los presentes tampoco, porque, de otra forma, una veintena de asesinos ya habrían tratado de acabar con Fidelio, esté donde esté. Es una herencia muy generosa, y los otros pretendientes no se han tomado muy bien su exclusión del testamento».
languages.original_text: "I haven't the faintest idea. And I think that no one present knows either, or two dozen hired killers would have already begun a manhunt for this Fidelio, wherever they may be hiding. This is, after all, a significant inheritance. And the other claimants are not exactly pleased at being left out of the will."

traits.locale_text: «No tengo ni la menor idea. Y creo que ninguno de los presentes tampoco, porque, de otra forma, una veintena de asesinos ya habrían tratado de acabar con Fidelio, esté donde esté. Es una herencia muy generosa, y los otros pretendientes no se han tomado muy bien su exclusión del testamento».

languages.text: 「それがさっぱりわからないのです。ここにいる方たちもわからないと思います。もし知っていれば、このフィデリオという者を始末するためにすでに何十人もの殺し屋が動いているはずですからね。かなりの大金ですし、他の相続人も遺言に書き残されなかったことを面白く思っていませんから」
languages.original_text: "I haven't the faintest idea. And I think that no one present knows either, or two dozen hired killers would have already begun a manhunt for this Fidelio, wherever they may be hiding. This is, after all, a significant inheritance. And the other claimants are not exactly pleased at being left out of the will."

traits.locale_text: 「それがさっぱりわからないのです。ここにいる方たちもわからないと思います。もし知っていれば、このフィデリオという者を始末するためにすでに何十人もの殺し屋が動いているはずですからね。かなりの大金ですし、他の相続人も遺言に書き残されなかったことを面白く思っていませんから」

languages.text: "Ich habe nicht die geringste Idee. Und ich glaube auch nicht, dass es einer der Anwesenden weiß, sonst hätten nicht zwei Dutzend angeheuerte Killer eine Menschenjagd auf diesen Fidelio begonnen, wo immer er sich verstecken mag. Schließlich geht es hier um eine bedeutsame Hinterlassenschaft. Und die übrigen Anwärter sind nicht gerade erfreut, dass sie aus dem Testament ausgeschlossen wurden."
languages.original_text: "I haven't the faintest idea. And I think that no one present knows either, or two dozen hired killers would have already begun a manhunt for this Fidelio, wherever they may be hiding. This is, after all, a significant inheritance. And the other claimants are not exactly pleased at being left out of the will."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe nicht die geringste Idee. Und ich glaube auch nicht, dass es einer der Anwesenden weiß, sonst hätten nicht zwei Dutzend angeheuerte Killer eine Menschenjagd auf diesen Fidelio begonnen, wo immer er sich verstecken mag. Schließlich geht es hier um eine bedeutsame Hinterlassenschaft. Und die übrigen Anwärter sind nicht gerade erfreut, dass sie aus dem Testament ausgeschlossen wurden."

languages.text: « Je n'en ai pas la moindre idée, et je crois que personne ici ne le sait. Sinon, une dizaine de tueurs auraient déjà ramené sa peau, où qu'il se cache. Après tout, cet héritage est assez conséquent. Inutile de vous dire que les autres prétendants ne sont pas ravis d'en avoir été exclus. »
languages.original_text: "I haven't the faintest idea. And I think that no one present knows either, or two dozen hired killers would have already begun a manhunt for this Fidelio, wherever they may be hiding. This is, after all, a significant inheritance. And the other claimants are not exactly pleased at being left out of the will."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'en ai pas la moindre idée, et je crois que personne ici ne le sait. Sinon, une dizaine de tueurs auraient déjà ramené sa peau, où qu'il se cache. Après tout, cet héritage est assez conséquent. Inutile de vous dire que les autres prétendants ne sont pas ravis d'en avoir été exclus. »

languages.text: "En ufak fikrim yok. Bence şu an burada bulunanlar da bilmiyor, yoksa o Fidelio'nun peşine çoktan iki düzine kiralık katili takmış olurlardı. Saklandığı delikte haklarlardı. Az buz bir mirastan bahsetmiyoruz. Ayrıca mirasta hak iddia edenler de vasiyette isimlerinin geçmemesinden pek hoşnut sayılmazlar."
languages.original_text: "I haven't the faintest idea. And I think that no one present knows either, or two dozen hired killers would have already begun a manhunt for this Fidelio, wherever they may be hiding. This is, after all, a significant inheritance. And the other claimants are not exactly pleased at being left out of the will."

traits.locale_text: "En ufak bir fikrim yok. Bence şu an burada olan kimse bilmiyor, yoksa iki düzine kiralık katil çoktan Fidelio'yu saklandığı yerde bulup çıkarmak için çalışmalara başlamış olurdu. Az buz bir mirastan bahsetmiyoruz. Ayrıca diğer hak sahipleri de vasiyette isimlerinin geçmediğine memnun olacak değiller."
